contents:
您的翻译很难说是精甚细腻：



1.

Liu Xiaoming started viewing porn on Twitter with Laowang VPN

  • viewing -> watching
  • with -> via



2.

Presently came along Xi Jinping, surfing through the tembestuous cyberspace[2], and said:

  • 结构有问题
  • Presently -> At the same time
  • At the same time,Xi Jinping, who was surfing through the tembestuous cyberspace[2], came to him, and said:



3.
The first that went off, Liu Xiaoming

  • The first rebel, Liu Xiaoming, went off
  • 之后的 Liu Xiaoming 可以缩写为 Liu


4.
To which Liu Xiaoming answered:


  • answered -> replied
  • 个人拙见，此处无需使用从句（To which）


5.
The second little rebel met a man running an airport and said:

  • running -> maintaining（维护） / hosting / （或者别的什么？）


6.
Well, he tear apart the pond, and he tear apart the ocean,

  • tear -> tore，此处需注意时态


7.
When he found that he could not, with all his tearing, get him doxxed, ultimately he said angrily:

  • When he found his inability to get Zhao doxxed with all his tearing, in ultimate anger he said:


应该还有几处不当，但是东八区时间太少，不干了睡大觉。
平心而论，我要亲自表扬一句：您使用了 Politician 这个词，而这个词刚好是贬义的 :)
Politicians are thought of as people who will say or do anything to get elected or to gain power.

Wikipedia: Statesman
